EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}settournaments adchannel [#Channel]** ~ Sets the default tournament advertisement channel.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}settournaments adchannel** ~ Disables the default tournament advertisement channel.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: **{{prefix}}settournaments resultchannel [#Channel]** ~ Sets the default tournament channel where match results will be reported.
EXTENDED_LINE_4: **{{prefix}}settournaments resultchannel** ~ Disables the default tournament result channel.
ALIASES: Settournaments does not have any aliases.
NEED_CHANNEL: You did not provide a channel.
SET_ADCHANNEL: The default tournament advertisement channel has been set to {{channel}}.
RESET_ADCHANNEL: The default tournament advertisement channel has been removed.
SET_RESULTCHANNEL: The default tournament match results channel has been set to {{channel}}.
RESET_RESULTCHANNEL: The default tournament match results channel has been removed.
